feed.title: Dagu Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.17.1
entry.content:
This release fixes a few rough edges in v1.17.0 and slips in some handy extras.

Contributors ‚ú®

Thanks to our contributors for this release: Feature | Contributors -- | -- One-click step re-run ‚Äì retry an individual step without touching the rest of the DAG | üõ†Ô∏è @thefishhat Nested-DAG log viewer ‚Äì see logs for every repeated child run | üí° @jeremydelattre59 Docker image ‚Äì fixes for asset paths & storage volumes | üê≥ @jhuang732 (report)

All Changes

  • fix: support camel case for step exit code field by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1031
  • feat: add dag step rerun by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1030
  • fix: asset serving with base path and Docker storage location by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1037
  • fix: display logs from all repeated child DAG runs by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1039
  • [Snyk] Upgrade lucide from 0.507.0 to 0.511.0 by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1035
  • [Snyk] Upgrade openapi-fetch from 0.13.8 to 0.14.0 by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1036

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.17.0...v1.17.1

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.17.2
entry.content:
This is a minor change release that includes the fix for the output capturing issue in the HTTP executor, as reported in #1040 (thanks to @nightly-brew).

All changes

  • fix: HTTP executor output not written to stdout by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1042

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.17.1...v1.17.2

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.17.3
entry.content:
This release includes some bug fixes in v1.17, along with a new feature for the HTTP executor.

New Features

  • HTTP Executor: Added skipTLSVerify option to support self-signed certificates (#1046)

Bug Fixes

  • fix: environment variable evaluation and test improvements by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1045
  • feat: add skipTLSVerify option to HTTP executor for self-signed certificates by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1046
  • fix: retry individual dag step by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1049
  • [#1048] fix: correct repeatPolicy documentation by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1056
  • fix: separate stdout and stderr streams in SSH executor by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1057
  • fix: repeat policy non zero exit codes by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1052
  • fix: DAGU_DAGS_DIR environment variable not recognized by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1060

Documentation

  • Repeat Policy: Corrected documentation and examples to accurately describe behavior (#1056)

Contributors

Thanks to our contributors for this release:

| Contribution | Author | |--------------|--------| | HTTP executor skipTLSVerify feature | @mnmercer (report), @nightly-brew (feedback) | | DAGU_DAGS_DIR environment variable fix | @Daffdi (report) | | SSH executor stdout/stderr separation | @NebulaCoding1029 (report) | | Repeat policy bug fixes and documentation | @jeremydelattre59 (reports) | | Retry individual step UI fix | @jeremydelattre59 (report), @thefishhat (implementation) | | Environment variable evaluation fixes | @jhuang732 (report) |

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.17.4
entry.content:
New Features

  • Windows Support (beta): Initial Windows compatibility with PowerShell and cmd.exe (#1066) by @pdoronila
  • Interactive DAG Selection: Run dagu start without arguments to select DAGs interactively (#1074)
  • OpenTelemetry Support: Added distributed tracing with W3C trace context propagation (#1068)

Bug Fixes

  • UI: Fixed 'f' key triggering fullscreen mode while editing DAGs (#1075)
  • SSH Executor: Fixed handling of || and && operators in command parsing (#1067)
  • JSON Schema: Corrected DAG JSON schema for schedule field (#1071)
  • Scheduler: Fixed scheduler discarding queued items when scheduled by enqueue (#1070)
  • Base DAG: Fixed parameter parsing issue in base DAG loading

Contributors

Thanks to our contributors for this release:

| Contribution | Author | |--------------|--------| | Initial Windows support - PowerShell/cmd.exe compatibility | @pdoronila | | Scheduler refactoring for improved maintainability | @thefishhat | | Interactive DAG selection feature request | @yottahmd | | OpenTelemetry distributed tracing feature request | @jeremydelattre59 | | SSH executor double pipe operator bug report | @NebulaCoding1029 | | 'f' key interference in DAG editor bug report | @NebulaCoding1029 | | Log cleanup feature request | @NebulaCoding1029 | | Scheduler queue bug report | Jochen |

All Changes

  • feat(scheduler): refactor code and logic by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1062
  • fix: handle || and && operators correctly in SSH executor command parsing by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1067
  • feat: initial windows support by @pdoronila in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1066
  • feat: add OpenTelemetry distributed tracing support by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1068
  • fix: correct DAG JSON schema for schedule field by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1071
  • feat: add interactive DAG selection and migrate progress display to Bubble Tea TUI by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1074
  • fix: prevent 'f' key from interfering with DAG editing by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1075

New Contributors

  • @pdoronila made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1066

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.17.3...v1.17.4

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.18.0
entry.content:
This release includes the following updates.

New Features - RepeatPolicy enhancements: added support for until and while modes ‚Äî thanks @thefishhat
- Live log loading in the Web‚ÄØUI
- RetryPolicy enhancements: added exponentialBackoff support ‚Äî thanks @Sarvesh-11
- OpenID¬†Connect (OIDC) authentication for the Web‚ÄØUI ‚Äî thanks @Arvintian
- Partial¬†Success status at the step level (feedback from @ghansham)
- Distributed workflow execution via worker processes
- Ability to specify multiple e‚Äëmail recipients for notifications
- Redundant scheduler support (multiple scheduler instances)

Improvements - Fixed maximum‚Äësize setting for output capture
- Refined the Web‚ÄØUI sidebar (feedback from @ghansham)
- Dependency upgrades ‚Äî thanks @reneleonhardt

Bug Fixes - Installation script corrections ‚Äî thanks @Sarvesh-11
- Fixed DAG list sorting issue in the Web‚ÄØUI (feedback from @ghansham)
- Various minor fixes

New Contributors - @Sarvesh-11 ‚Äî first contribution: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1091
- @reneleonhardt ‚Äî first contribution: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1127

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.17.4...v1.18.0
